content: fibrefest is an annual event organised by knitters guild nsw this year s festival takes place at wyong racecourse on sunday 10 september 10 00 4 00 free entry this bag has been designed to celebrate the festival go crazy with colours and beads or make it simple with one colour only the choice is yours this bag was designed by crochet turramurra member di scaysbrook who won the prize for the best crocheted bag for fibrefest congratulations di enjoy
